tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
  review_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    review_text VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    feedback_text VARCHAR(255),
    feedback_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    game_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_rating INT
);
